1{-# LANGUAGE ScopedTypeVariables #-}
2{-# OPTIONS_GHC -Wall #-}
3
4-- | Judgement writer.
5
6module Koshucode.Baala.Writer.Judge
7  ( -- * Writer
8    putJudges, putJudgesWith, hPutJudgesWith,
9    judgesCountMix,
10    -- * Counter
11    JudgeCount, JudgeCountMix,
12    judgeCount, judgeCountMix, judgeSummary,
13  ) where
14
15import Data.Monoid ((<>))
16import qualified Data.Map                            as Map
17import qualified Koshucode.Baala.Overture            as O
18import qualified Koshucode.Baala.System              as O
19import qualified Koshucode.Baala.Base                as B
20import qualified Koshucode.Baala.Type                as T
21import qualified Koshucode.Baala.Core                as C
22
23
24-- ----------------------  Writer
25
26-- | Print list of judgements.
27putJudges :: (Show c, B.MixEncode c) => [T.Judge c] -> IO ()
28putJudges js =
29    do _ <- putJudgesWith (O.exitCode 0) js
30       return ()
31
32-- | `B.stdout` version of `hPutJudgesWith`.
33putJudgesWith :: (Show c, B.MixEncode c) => B.ExitCode -> [T.Judge c] -> IO B.ExitCode
34putJudgesWith = hPutJudgesWith B.stdout B.def
35
36-- | Print list of judges.
37hPutJudgesWith :: (B.MixEncode c) => C.ResultWriterJudge c
38hPutJudgesWith h result status js =
39    do let (mx, cnt, tab) = judgesCountMix result B.mixEncode js $ judgeCountMix []
40       B.hPutMix T.judgeBreak h mx
41       O.hPutLines h $ judgeSummary status (cnt, tab)
42       return status
43
44-- | Edit judgements to mix text.
45judgesCountMix :: forall c.
46    C.Result c -> (T.Judge c -> B.MixText) -> [T.Judge c] -> O.Map JudgeCountMix
47judgesCountMix result writer = loop where
48    loop (j : js) cnt  = loop js $ put j cnt
49    loop [] (mx, c, tab) =
50        let mx' = (B.mixHard `when` (c > 0)) <> B.mixLine (total c)
51        in (mx <> mx', c, tab)
52
53    put :: T.Judge c -> O.Map JudgeCountMix
54    put judge (mx, c, tab) =
55        let c'   = c + 1
56            cls  = T.getClass judge
57            mx'  = gutterMix c <> B.mixLine (writer judge)
58            tab' = Map.alter inc cls tab
59        in (mx <> mx', c', tab')
60
61    gutterMix c | mod5 c && c > 0  = B.mixLine (progress c `when` mod25 c)
62                | otherwise        = B.mixEmpty
63
64    mod25 n       = n `mod` measure == 0
65    mod5  n       = n `mod` gutter  == 0
66    gutter        = C.resultGutter  result
67    measure       = C.resultMeasure result
68
69    total    n    = B.mixLine (B.mixString "*** " <> B.mixString (count n))
70    progress n    = B.mixLine (B.mixString "*** " <> B.mixShow n)
71
72    inc (Nothing) = Just 1
73    inc (Just n)  = Just $ n + 1
74
75when :: (Monoid a) => a -> Bool -> a
76when a True  = a
77when _ False = mempty
78
79
80-- ----------------------  Counter
81
82-- | Total and per-judgement counter.
83type JudgeCount = (Int, Map.Map T.JudgeClass Int)
84
85-- | Mix text and judgement counter.
86type JudgeCountMix = (B.MixText, Int, Map.Map T.JudgeClass Int)
87
88-- | Zero counters.
89--
90--   >>> judgeCount $ words "A B C"
91--   (0, fromList [("A",0), ("B",0), ("C",0)])
92--
93judgeCount :: [T.JudgeClass] -> JudgeCount
94judgeCount ps = (0, Map.fromList $ zip ps $ repeat 0)
95
96-- | Empty and zero counters.
97judgeCountMix :: [T.JudgeClass] -> JudgeCountMix
98judgeCountMix ps = (B.mixEmpty, 0, Map.fromList $ zip ps $ repeat 0)
99
100-- | Generate judgement counter comment.
101--
102--  >>> O.putLines $ judgeSummary (O.exitCode 0) (10, Map.fromList [("A", 3), ("B", 6), ("C", 1)])
103--  **
104--  **  SUMMARY
105--  **       3 judges on A
106--  **       6 judges on B
107--  **       1 judge  on C
108--  **      10 judges in total
109--  **
110--
111judgeSummary :: B.ExitCode -> JudgeCount -> [String]
112judgeSummary status (_, tab) = B.texts sumDoc where
113    label | status == B.ExitSuccess = "SUMMARY"
114          | otherwise               = "SUMMARY (VIOLATED)"
115
116    sumDoc              = B.CommentDoc [sumSec]
117    sumSec              = B.CommentSec label $ sumLines ++ [total]
118    sumLines            = map sumLine $ Map.assocs tab
119    sumLine (p, n)      = countPad n ++ " on " ++ p
120    total               = countPad (sumOf tab) ++ " in total"
121
122    sumOf :: Map.Map a Int -> Int
123    sumOf = Map.foldr (+) 0
124
125    countPad = O.padBegin 11 . count
126
127count :: Int -> String
128count 0  = "no judges"
129count 1  = "1 judge "
130count n  = show n ++ " judges"
131
